TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceDataCollection extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

summary.span: 提供 物件的強型別集合。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表集合，其中包含的計數器的所有執行個體資料。The class represents a collection containing all the instance data for a counter. 此集合包含在時使用方法。This collection is contained in the when using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示特定的執行個體資料本機電腦上。The following code example displays the instance data for a particular on the local computer. 它會顯示目的編號的清單名稱。It first displays a numbered list of names. 使用者輸入的其中一個類別目錄數目之後，此範例會取得該。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the example gets the for that . 然後將轉換所傳回的集合陣列物件。It then converts the collection returned by to an array of objects. 此範例也會顯示每個相關聯的執行個體資料每個。The example also displays the instance data associated with each of each . [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#1)]

span.span: Determines whether a performance instance with a specified name (identified by one of the indexed objects) exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果執行個體存在於集合中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the instance exists in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceName`參數不區分大小寫。The `instanceName` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可接受類別名稱、 計數器名稱和執行個體名稱，從命令列。The following code example accepts a category name, counter name, and instance name from the command line. 它會取得分類中，這是一系列物件。It gets the for the category, which is a collection of objects. 從，它會取得特定針對指定的計數器。From that it gets the particular for the specified counter. 然後它會使用方法來判斷是否指定的執行個體存在，則使用預設的單一執行個體名稱，如果沒有任何輸入。It then uses the method to determine if the specified instance exists, using the default single-instance name if none is entered. span.span: Copies the items in the collection to the specified one-dimensional array at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，將轉換成陣列物件。The following code example uses the method to convert an into an array of objects. 值和陣列的每個項目的屬性會傳遞至函式，以便進一步處理。The values of the and properties of each element of the array are passed to a function for further processing. param.name: instanceName
param.span: 效能計數器分類執行個體的名稱，如果分類包含單一執行個體，則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The name of the performance counter category instance, or an empty string ("") if the category contains a single instance.

summary.span: 取得與這個計數器相關聯的執行個體資料。

span.span: Gets the instance data associated with this counter.

summary.span: 通常是一組未經處理的計數器值。

span.span: This is typically a set of raw counter values.

value.span: 項目， 物件要根據它來建立索引。

span.span: An item, by which the object is indexed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceName`參數不區分大小寫。The `instanceName` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可接受類別名稱、 計數器名稱和執行個體名稱，從命令列。The following code example accepts a category name, counter name, and instance name from the command line. 它會取得分類中，這是一系列物件。It gets the for the category, which is a collection of objects. 從，它會取得特定針對指定的計數器。From that it gets the particular for the specified counter. 然後，如果執行個體存在時，此範例會使用屬性 （參考當做索引子） 以取得相關聯物件。Then, if the instance exists, the example uses the property (referenced as an indexer) to obtain the associated object. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection.ItemContains/CS/instdatacolitemcontains.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection.ItemContains/VB/instdatacolitemcontains.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ICollection Keys { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ICollection Keys
Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 為與這個執行個體資料相關聯的物件取得物件和計數器登錄機碼。

span.span: Gets the object and counter registry keys for the objects associated with this instance data.

value.span: ，表示一組物件特定的登錄機碼。

span.span: An that represents a set of object-specific registry keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安裝和執行時，這會將計數器資料時，每個軟體元件會建立其物件和計數器的機碼。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 如同其他任何登錄資料存取，您可以存取此資料。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data. 不過，雖然您可以使用登錄來收集效能資料，資料不儲存在登錄資料庫。However, although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 相反地，系統會收集的資料，從適當的系統物件管理員。Instead, the system collects the data from the appropriate system object managers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性傳回集合的執行個體名稱，它會轉換成陣列。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of instance names, which it converts to an array of . 它會產生陣列物件，使用屬性。It generates an array of objects using the property. 每個項目中的執行個體名稱的陣列，其顯示名稱，並呼叫的函式來處理相關聯物件。For each element in the array of instance names, it displays the name and calls a function to process the associated object. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#3)]

.property instance class System.Collections.ICollection Values
Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得未經處理的計數器值，這些數值構成計數器的執行個體資料。

span.span: Gets the raw counter values that comprise the instance data for the counter.

value.span: ，表示計數器未經處理的資料值。

span.span: An that represents the counter's raw data values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性傳回的集合物件，它會轉換成陣列。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of objects, which it converts to an array. 它會產生執行個體名稱使用陣列屬性。It generates an array of instance names using the property. 陣列中的每個項目的物件，它會顯示相關聯的執行個體名稱，並呼叫函式來處理物件。For each element in the array of objects, it displays the associated instance name and calls a function to process the object. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#3)]
